tasks.title: Implement camera control (edge and keyboard scrolling)
tasks.description: Deliver map navigation controls for fixed-height, horizontal multi-screen battlefield.
tasks.details: Implement camera controller in adapter layer with configurable scroll speed, dead zones, and boundary clamps for ~3-screen map width.
tasks.testStrategy: Scene tests validate camera movement, boundary clamping, and input source parity.

tasks.title: Implement pause/1x/2x time controls with full freeze
tasks.description: Provide runtime speed controls where pause freezes all timers and queued countdowns.
tasks.details: Hook time-scale controller into core tick abstraction. Pause must freeze day/night, spawn scheduling, training, repairs, and build timers consistently.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration tests assert zero progression under pause and deterministic resume across all timer subsystems.

tasks.title: Implement action feedback and failure reason prompts
tasks.description: Show clear UI prompts for invalid placement, blocked action, and unavailable operation causes.
tasks.details: Implement structured reason-code to localized message mapping and UI toast/dialog routing. Include prompts for migration errors and rejected config load.
tasks.testStrategy: UI tests verify reason-code coverage and localization key mapping for all failure classes.

tasks.title: Implement autosave slot manager (single slot policy)
tasks.description: Implement one autosave slot with day-start triggers and immutable slot ownership policy.
tasks.details: Add save manager using versioned payload with single autosave channel. Ensure manual save flow cannot overwrite autosave channel if policy forbids.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests validate day-start autosave trigger and slot write-protection invariants.

tasks.title: Implement forced save migration and invalid-load rejection
tasks.description: Require migration for old payloads and reject invalid saves with explicit user guidance.
tasks.details: Create migration pipeline with schema/version checks and fail-fast rejection paths. Expose clear remediation prompts when migration fails.
tasks.testStrategy: Migration tests cover forward migration success, unsupported version failure, and corrupted payload rejection.

tasks.title: Implement Steam cloud synchronization integration
tasks.description: Integrate cloud save sync for Steam-account-bound profiles with deterministic conflict policy.
tasks.details: Implement cloud sync adapter with manifest and package strategy, include conflict detection and predictable winner policy documented for UX.
tasks.testStrategy: Adapter tests validate upload/download lifecycle and conflict handling simulation.

tasks.title: Implement battle report generation pipeline
tasks.description: Persist and display battle report fields: seed, wave timeline, queue snapshots, rewards, economy outcomes.
tasks.details: Create report DTO and serializer for end-of-run summary. Include deterministic identifiers for replay comparability and diagnostics.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests validate schema completeness and deterministic report content for fixed-seed sessions.

tasks.title: Implement deterministic achievement framework (20 visible)
tasks.description: Implement 20 non-hidden achievements with explicit trigger conditions and timing windows.
tasks.details: Create achievement registry and trigger engine bound to event stream and report milestones. Ensure deterministic unlock behavior under replay.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests and integration scenarios verify trigger conditions and no duplicate unlock regressions.

tasks.title: Implement bilingual i18n key system with runtime switch
tasks.description: Provide zh-CN/en-US launch support, runtime switching, and previous-language memory.
tasks.details: Define key-based localization catalog structure and fallback behavior. Persist language preference locally and reload safely on startup.
tasks.testStrategy: Localization tests validate key completeness, fallback rules, and runtime switch persistence.

tasks.title: Implement launch QA gates for audio and performance baselines
tasks.description: Establish smoke checks for music/SFX channels and performance targets (1% low 45 FPS, avg 60 FPS).
tasks.details: Add headless and playable smoke scripts collecting FPS and stability metrics into logs. Include pass/fail criteria and baseline trend output for CI-local use.
tasks.testStrategy: Performance smoke test verifies thresholds under fixed test scene and records reproducible summaries.
